name: A Very Scrappy 3D Platformer
description:
Made for GMTK game jam 2019.

You can jump, double jump, sprint, wall slide and wall jump.

edit: In the tutorial section the player is told that they can sprint with control, this is a typo, the key is actually shift.

My idea for how this would fit the theme of only one is that there is only one level, and as you progress through the level it gets larger and larger as more parts spawn in. Then at the end when you've spawned in the whole level you will be able to see the whole thing and how large it is even though it's still only one level. This isn't to apparent in the game however as there are only a few different parts.
